channel.title: [Rune-Pk] Pking/Hybriding Server
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/1438/69882111.gif[/img]
[U][U]Why Join Rune PK?[/U][/U]
[B]The reason we put this server up is to have a fun server that is based on pking without spawning or slow experience rates, but still have a challenge.Rune-Pk is a new private server that offers easy training because that is what most of you play private servers these days isn't it? Anyways, to get on topic,this server is for people who want to level fast and get straight to the PKing. The server has a PKing/PvN economy and some skilling which targets players who don't want to PK all the time.
[U]Play Now[/U] www.mediafire.com/?h15b32cez88ys8w
[U]Forums[/U] www.Rune-Pk.org
[U]Features[/U] - Takes 10-20 Minutes to get maxed out - Easy MoneyMaking - Great Combat System - Perfect player and NPC animations - 24/7 uptime - PKing/PvN Economy - Jad = 1 Wave - Godwars/Barrows/Barbarian Minigame - Chaotics/Spirit shields/Torva - 100% Working Curses - Voting System - Magebank, West/East dragons, 44 Port tele's - Working - Working Specials on 99.8% of items - Frost Dragons - Tormented DemonsEXP LOCK/ EXP COUNTER! - Random Pvp Drops such as Ancient Statue/Pvp Armor
[U]Client[/U] - Low Memory usage - Doesn't require a full cache
[U]Thieving[/U] [img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/7351/start2.png[/img]
[U]Pk Point Shop[/U] [img]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/3227/pkpoint.png[/img]
[U]Npc Interacting[/U] [img]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/5388/npcinteracting.png[/img]
[U]Food/Pots Shop[/U] [img]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/950/foodshop.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/szwx7n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2yjr5o9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2j5yulu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ziu2ia.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/34pc76g.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/55ihk1.jpg[/img]
[U]Combat System[/U] [img]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/3445/yousok.gif[/img] [img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/2297/30787969.gif[/img] [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/4333/369a3bf44afe4c16903681e.png[/img] [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/2456/0d1c392a890a40ecbdb4bdc.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: [Rune-Pk] Pking/Hybriding Server
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Bl33m, post:28, topic:452174”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=555057.msg4090983#msg4090983 date=1346356592]

You should get donations because you deserve them, not because players can obtain items from doing it.

This. Donations should be based on how good the game-play is and how loyal your players are. Not what you can gain from sending a child money.
[/quote]

I Doubt nearly 75% of the people who donate do it for supporting the server Lol.[/quote]
That’s kind of unfair for the other players who can’t donate.

Read full topic
